title: Having weird issue at loading screen and in game as well as random ping spikes
body: Well before this recent patch I felt like I was having issues with ping but lately at loading screen when everyone shows up on the screen it will show 0% for everyone at the same time and it'll stay that way the entire loading screen almost til the end when everyone's starts going up at the same time but never reaching 100% and then bang I'm in game at like 35%. Then while in game to go along with ping spikes the game itself will freeze randomly. It especially freezes if someone surrenders or the nexus is killed it'll freeze from 1 to 4 seconds before going to the nexus explosion. Any help with this would be very appreciated.

replies.body: This sounds like a pretty unstable connection that's getting cut off while trying to load and having hiccups if you get in at all.  My suggestion would be to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and stabilize things a bit.  I hope that helps!
